//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                                   Reg   Size
//   -------------------------------------- ----- ----

//   ScreenToShadowMatrix                   c7       4
//   ShadowTexelSize                        c11      1
//   ShadowFadeFraction                     c12      1
//   SceneColorTexture                      s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture                     s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture                     s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 1, 0, 2, 3
    def c6, 0.111110002, 0, 0, 0
    def c13, -1, -0.999000013, 1, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, v0.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, v0.x
      mov r1.yz, v0.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif

// Stereoise v0
texldl r31, c220.z, s13
mov r30.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r30.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r30.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r30.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c8

// Unstereoise before ScreenToShadowMatrix
add r31.w, r0.x, -r31.y
mad r0.y, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c7, r0.y, r1
    mad r0, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c10
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.w, r0
    mul r1.xy, r0, c0
    frc r1.xy, r1
    mov r2.xz, c13
    mad r0.xy, r0, c0, r2.x
    add r0.xy, -r1, r0
    mul r3.xy, r0, c11
    mov r3.zw, c4.y
    texldl r3, r3, s2
    max r1.z, c13.y, -r0.z
    add r0.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_sat r3.x, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r4, r0.xyxy, c5.xyzy
    mul r4, r4, c11.xyxy
    mul r5, r4.xyxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r5, r5, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r5.x
    mad_sat r5.x, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r4, r4.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r4, r4, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mad_sat r4.x, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.wyyx
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r7, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r7, r7, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r7.x
    mad_sat r7.x, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r3.y, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.xxzx
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r8, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r8, r8, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r8.x
    mad_sat r5.y, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r4.y, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.wxyz
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r8, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r8, r8, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r8.x
    mad_sat r7.y, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r3.z, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.xzzz
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r8, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww

    add r0.z, r1.z, r8.x
    mad_sat r5.z, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r4.z, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.wzyw
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r8, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww

    add r0.z, r1.z, r8.x
    mad_sat r7.z, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r3.w, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r6, r0.xyxy, c5.xwzw
    mul r6, r6, c11.xyxy
    mul r8, r6.xyxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r8, r8, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r8.x
    mad_sat r5.w, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    mul r6, r6.zwxx, c13.zzww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r4.w, r0.z, c0.z, r2.z
    add r0.xy, r0, c5.w
    mul r0.xy, r0, c11
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s2
    add r0.x, r1.z, r0.x
    mad_sat r7.w, r0.x, c0.z, r2.z
    lrp r0, r1.x, r5.xyyz, r3.xyyz
    lrp r6, r1.x, r4.xyyz, r5.xyyz
    lrp r8, r1.x, r7.xyyz, r4.xyyz
    lrp r2.xy, r1.y, r0.ywzw, r0.xzzw
    lrp r0.xy, r1.y, r6.ywzw, r6.xzzw
    lrp r0.zw, r1.y, r8.xyyw, r8.xyxz

    lrp r2.w, r1.y, r4.y, r4.x

    lrp r3.xy, r1.x, r7.zwzw, r4.zwzw
    lrp r4.y, r1.y, r3.y, r3.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, r2.x
    add r0.x, r0.z, r0.x
    add r0.x, r2.y, r0.x

    add r0.x, r2.w, r0.x
    add r0.x, r4.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, r4.y, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c6.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.x, c13.x
    mad_pp r0.x, c12.x, r0.x, r2.z
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0, r0.x

// approximately 160 instruction slots used (35 texture, 125 arithmetic)
